name: Magical Girls Academy_Not A Doodle Game Thanks To Jimena
name_original: Magical Girls Academy_Not A Doodle Game Thanks To Jimena
description:
Magical Girls Academy_Not a doodle game thanks to Jimena is a game inspired in the old Clefairy game from Pokemon Stadium N64.  It was supposed to be a doodle game but Jimena loves the extra work so.. it;s not a doodles game :) .... Still need to find some music for the game :) ...

You will need to connect an xbox or ps controller in order to play, it's local multiplayer up to 4 players. 

Some animations still missing we will work on that later :) 

Jimena art can be found on: https://www.facebook.com/ookamijimeart/   https://itch.io/profile/ookamijime
